data.title: What a great experience!
data.text: This is THE BEST TOUR of downtown Asheville.   We were so happy we did this.  Kevin is an extremely knowledgeable guide and very personable.  The tour was on audio of what Kevin was telling us and, therefore, easy to follow.  If you want to know about Asheville ... this IS the tour.

data.title: moms birthday present
data.text: I purchased this tour for my moms birthday and Rick did a great job! We really enjoyed seeing a different side of Asheville!

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Happy belated birthday to Mom!  Glad you all enjoyed the tour with Rick.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text:
We really enjoyed this.  First they have the "whispers" so you can hear the guide w/o having to be right next to him which was great.  I like to take pictures so this allowed me to lag behind a bit to get good photos while still hearing the commentary.  He pointed out buildings and things I never would have saw on my own, and by walking we were really able to see vs. driving by it at 30+.

He was extremely knowledgeable and personable!   My husband and I were running a minute or two behind before the tour started and he was gracious and kind to us vs. acting irritated as many would have.   He also kept a great pace that allowed you to see without being rushed or board.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Lisa, it was great to have you and your husband on the tour.  The "whisper" headsets make it so easy to hear your guide.  It's especially great for a photographer such as yourself to capture a great pic and not miss the tour!  Thanks for your review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Superb Asheville by Foot Walking Tour
data.text: Superb tour by Rick, who is a real pro.  He not only clearly presented the history of Asheville, he also described the flavor of this area, with interesting stories and memorable fun facts.  I want to go again!

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Rick loves this city and really get folks excited about Asheville.  Thanks for acknowledging Rick's great work!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Low-Energy Basic Tour
data.text: Our tour with Sharon had some introductory information about the town of Asheville, and included a few nuggets of really interesting stuff. I though the walking pace was pretty slow, and I am 7 months pregnant. Sharon was pretty low-energy and almost seemed bored with the tour at times though. But all in all, we did learn more about the city.

data.title: A definite MUST DO
data.text: This tour was great! I learned so much and enjoyed the little exercise it provided. We went on a good walk through the city while the tour guide taught us about the history of the city. The tour will have you appreciating the city and its history a lot more. I recommend it to tourist and locals!

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the high recommendation.  We are glad you had such a good time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A MUST DO in Asheville
data.text: Kevan was extremely knowledgeable, informative and fun. I learned so much about the city, history, and fun facts.  Got to see a lot of hidden gems on streets I might not have gotten too.  An absolute must do in Asheville.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hidden gems are our specialty.  By being on foot we can get in the nooks and crannies to share several interesting Asheville secrets. Thanks for calling Asheville by Foot a Must  Do!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A great tour!
data.text: One of the best of the many city walking tours we've taken. Kevan was informative and enjoyable. The Tour-Mate listening devices made the experience perfect.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you enjoyed the tour! Out goal is a work-class tour of our beloved Mountain Metropolis.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun and informative
data.text: very fun and educational walk thru the city, learning of it's origins and history. A very rich history - literally. Our guide Rick was very knowledgeable and made the walk even more fun pointing out all sorts of facts. The tour uses wireless headsets, so you can hear everything clearly and not miss anything due to street noise. I recommend this tour to get to know the city and it's history - and some hidden and fun facts.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Allan, thanks for the kind words.  Rick is a great guy and really knows some special gems about Asheville.  We are glad you enjoyed the tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Saturday Morning activity!
data.text: Last Saturday my husband and I participated in the downtown tour with Kevin.  He was extremely knowledgeable, set a great walking pace, and was willing to answer a lot of questions! We thoroughly enjoyed it and would recommend it to families or individuals..,great way to learn about Asheville!

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We love questions!  Thanks for being so engaged on the tour.  It was a pleasure!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful walking tour!
data.text: We booked a Saturday morning walking tour.   It was really fun to learn about the history of Ashevile!  Our tour guide, Kevin was really knowledgeable about Asheville and offered a lot of awesome insights!  The walk was an easy 2 hour hike around the downtown area, but be sure to wear comfortable shoes and bring water.  I would recommend this tour for people who are interested to learn about Asheville.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the recommendation!  We are so glad you enjoyed the tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Easy and engaging walking tour!
data.text:
I am a 5th generation Ashevillian and know a good deal about the area, but still learned a lot on this tour. Kevan covers art, architecture, history, literature, economics, and the roaring 20s society pages, all while taking you on an easy jaunt through picturesque downtown. 

Two things to note: 1) you learn a lot, but it is far from boring and 2) the tour really is an easy walk despite what you might anticipate in Asheville. I accidentally forgot to pack sneakers and did the tour in flip flops with a bum knee and it was totally fine.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are thrilled you enjoyed the tour and glad that even as a native you learned new things about Asheville.  Thanks too for the note about the ease of the walk. Folks often assume that downtown is a difficult walk, but as you indicate, it's actually very easy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good way to learn about area
data.text: Asheville by foot walking tour is a great way to learn about the area and then back track to areas you like best and explore them more.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your review. Our goal is to make sure folks walk away familiar with downtown in a way that gets them ready for their Asheville adventure.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Informative, but not enthusiastic
data.text: We did a walking tour with Sharon and, while we learned a lot about Asheville, we felt that the tour was very low energy. Our teens liked hearing about the history of the buildings and the interesting citizens over the years and we appreciated the opportunity to go into the church. However, there weren't many opportunities to ask questions. We are glad we took the tour, but it suffered in comparison to walking tours we have experienced in other cities.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wildnova01, thank you for your review.  We are so sorry to hear that the tour did not meet your expectations.  As you can tell from the other reviews that is an extremely rare occurrence with any of our great guides at Asheville by Foot and really appreciate your thoughtful feedback.  Please feel free to contact me directly as to how we can make this right with you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Interesting tour providing details on the transformation of Asheville over the years
data.text: Interesting tour providing details on the transformation of Asheville over the years.  I had no idea how much change the city has gone through until hearing this tour.  Covered a good portion of downtown but not too exhausting either as far as speed and incline (and I was 7 months pregnant).  If you have small children, recommend using a stroller and bringing activities for them to do.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Folks assume that being in the mountains that Asheville will be hilly.  In truth, downtown, being in a valley, is pretty flat and makes for an easy walk.  Glad you enjoyed the tour!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Walking Tour of Asheville - Perfect way to learn about the city
data.text: Dr. Kevan Frazier did a great job giving us a tour of Asheville.  He is quite knowledgable and was great at sharing his knowledge with stories and anecdotes, all while pointing out some very interesting architecture.  It was a gorgeous day in Asheville, and the pace was just right for taking in the sights.  One of the most interesting things we saw was the crypt of Rafael Guastavino located in the Basilica of St. Lawrence. Guastavino, along with R. S. Smith, another architect, designed the marvelous Basilica.  At just under two hours, I would recommend this tour as a perfect way to learn a lot about Asheville.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind review.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the tour! One the especially great features of a walking tour is being able to get in the nooks and crannies of downtown in a way that only being on foot allows.  Thanks again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great tour
data.text: We had a wonderful tour of Asheville with Rick.  It was just long enough yet offered insight into the area and it's history and architecture.  We were able to find our way around with greater ease following the tour.  We walked away knowing so much more about the area.  Thank you for sharing your knowledge and making us feel welcome!

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Rick is such a great guide.  His love for Asheville is palpable.  Thanks for taking the tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Walking Tour of Downtown Asheville
data.text: This is a fantastic tour for learning about Asheville and orienting yourself to the area.  Our guide, John, was incredibly informative and provided the perfect mix of history, architecture, and the little tidbits that give a city character.  The tour was the perfect length and was an easy walk.  I would definitely recommend this tour for both those who are new to Asheville or those who would like to dig a little deeper into its history.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We are fortunate at ABF to have incredible guides like John who can really tell the Asheville story. Glad you enjoyed the tour!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Informative and fun
data.text: We loved this tour!! The owner of the company, Kevan, was our guide. (Check out his book, Legendary Locals of Asheville.) He is extremely informative, knows his local history very well, and the stories he told were very interesting. The pace was steady -  not too slow, not too fast. Even though nearly everyone on the tour lives in Asheville, it was so much fun to tour our own city and learn something new. I would highly recommend this for visitor and resident!! Be prepared to walk. Wear comfortable shoes and dress accordingly for the weather.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad to hear you enjoyed the tour.  We aim for locals and visitors alike to find the tour useful and are glad you did.  Thanks for your kind words and for taking the tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very knowledgable and personable guide
data.text: The guide was great, and provided a wonderful historical perspective of Ashville as well as an interesting background of all of the architecture. The handsets were a bonus as we did not have to struggle to understand him as we walked along. We would certainly recommend this tour.

owner_response.author: Kevan F, Owner at Asheville by Foot - Walking Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your kind words.  We really pride ourselves in having outstanding guides who are both knowledgable and personable. A great guide can make your entire trip not just your tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
